overview: Live performance at the Grand Teatre del Liceu in Barcelona in 2009.  When Donizetti s comedy, updated to the mid-20th century by the Uruguayan-born director Mario Gas, was mounted at Barcelona's magnificent Liceu opera house in 2005, Opera News wrote that:  The absolute hit of the production was . . . Rolando Villaz√≥n, a commanding, vulnerable and hilarious Nemorino.
title: L'Elisir D'Amore - Barcelona
